lyrics:
10 contributorsintro lyricspart 1

produced by busta rhymes

spoken interlude lord have mercy
as we approach the current time frame of 1997
with approximately two and a half years before the year 2000
repeatedly it has been reported that there will be a time soon approaching
that a major disaster will be striking all levels of existence
it has also been reported that this disastrous thing will be approaching
in the form of many
many as in squad squad as in flipmode squad
it has also been reported that everyone out of the many will strike
but this particular motherfucker will strike with an unmeasurable blast
and will fuck up everything within its 360 degree radius
warning prepare yourselves store your food stack your paper
because when this motherfucker gets here its about to get real fucked up for everyone and everything
everywhere

part 2

produced by omar glover

spoken interlude rudy ray moore aka dolomite
well busta rhymes
come on over here and let me talk to you son
see now dolomite just got back from some shit that you bout to be in
well are you prepared i hope you are prepared nigga
cause you know this is album number two yes more bitches than before
therell be more bitches more and more and more
more thirsty niggas tryin to get inside yo shit
tryin to throw your whole chemistry off oh yes
theres gonna be a lot more money
yes a lot more money than before
though son dont you worry about none of that shit
all you gotta do is just slap your dick in the mouth of these bitches
that dont wanna act right
and put a hot one in any motherfucker that wants to get in the way of this power move shit right here
okay son all right busta enough of this shit talkin
lets be on our way cause when disaster strikes
theres gonna be a whole lot of motherfuckers pourin in
alright baby lets go
see busta rhymes liveget tickets as low as 37you might also likepart 3

spoken interlude spliff star  busta rhymes
yo yo yo yo yo yo hah
ladies and gentlemen
straight from the motherfucking street corner

on the return trip
it be them niggas them niggas that live by the code of blood honor hoo
my flipmode niggas hah uh

here to hit you motherfuckers with a strike of disaster
i bring on to you once again
the eighth wonder of the world my nigga ah busta rhymes yeah
and i be that nigga ah that live nigga spliffaspliff ah
comin through right at you wherever the fuck you at
flipmode is the squad ahh comin through right at you wherever the fuck you at
oh ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah
ayo cut my shit off cut my shit off cut it off

outro busta rhymes
eheheheheheheheheheheh
